name: Fret Smasher
description:
A community focused band rhythm game with complete player customization and a wide selection of game modes.

Play solo or with friends to artists such as Freen In Green, Vinyl Dial, Nightmare Lyre, and more! Pick between game modes for cooperative play or competitive and see who can reach the ultimate high score.

Features

  • Full Band: Play your favourite tunes on Lead Guitar, Rhythm Guitar, Bass Guitar, Keyboard and Drums!
  • Over 10 Songs To Choose From: Including "It All Comes Together by Freen In Green", "Solar Sands by Vinyl Dial", "Everest by Johari" and more!
  • Customization: Customize the game to your liking from highways, video backgrounds, themes to even gameplay!

Select A Game Mode

  • Fret Smasher Mode: Play with our unique scoring system to break out with new high scores!
  • Classic Mode: Play any song you want using the scoring system you've come to love!
  • Arcade Mode: Play through all of your favourite songs with a twist! Can you reach the ultimate high score?
  • Multiplayer: Play against or cooperate with your friends using either Classic, Arcade or Fret Smasher scoring!
